alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 1:25PM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST TO 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler, Eastern Clay, Eastern Putnam and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM EST to 10 AM EDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
